sentences.sentence: He was surrounded by his numerous progeny.
But it is only among our own progeny [children].
sentences.translation: 但这只是发生在我们自己的子孙身上。

sentences.sentence: The central issue in the case is whether patent rights to living things extend to the progeny of those things.
sentences.translation: 这里的核心问题是生物的专利权是否延伸到这些生物的后代。
